title: Souls
description: Book 2 in the Throne of Flames series.He is a High Fae and her master, while she is Fae herself but only works as his maid.When they first met, he showed her disdain, causing her to hate him at first sight.However, to save her family's life and remain in his good graces, she must carry out her master's increasingly tricky tasks despite the strange and unknown reasons behind them.*The full blurb is coming soon.This is a fae fantasy romance series by Misha Quinn with an arranged marriage, fated mates, and enemies-to-lovers vibes.If you enjoy reading feeling & action-packed, and sexy fantasy romances set in a world of High Fae and mystical creatures, such as dragons, read Throne of Flames, a fae fantasy romance series, to adventure, feel, and love just like the heroines of these stories.Throne of Flames series:Dreams, book # 1, Aug 2023Souls, book #2, (Apr 2024)Hearts, book #3, (Sep 2024)
author: Misha Quinn
